dialogs.gitOpsCannotDo: Cannot: Perform code rollback operations (Git reset/stash)
dialogs.gitOpsNote: This means you will not be able to restore code to previous states through the rewind feature.

extensions.title: Claude Extensions Manager
extensions.subtitle: Manage Plugins, Subagents and Agent Skills
extensions.pluginsDescription: Installed plugins (can contain commands, agents, skills, hooks, MCP servers)
extensions.author: Author
extensions.skillsLocation: Agent Skills are stored in .claude/skills/ directory (filename format: NAME.SKILL.md)
extensions.skillsRepoDescription: Contains official example Skills: document processing, creative design, development tools, etc.
extensions.subagentDescription: Create a new subagent. Subagents are specialized AI assistants with specific system prompts.
extensions.skillDescription: Create a new Agent Skill. Skills provide Claude with domain-specific knowledge and guidance.
extensions.name: Name
extensions.nameHint: Only letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores allowed
extensions.systemPromptPlaceholder: You are a professional code review expert...
extensions.guidancePlaceholder: Follow these steps to execute the task...
extensions.defaultAgentContent:
You are a professional AI assistant.

When executing tasks:
- Analyze requirements carefully
- Provide clear solutions
- Follow best practices
extensions.defaultSkillContent:
Follow these steps to execute the task:

1. Analyze input
2. Execute operation
3. Return result

autoCompact.title: Auto Context Management
autoCompact.subtitle: Configure Claude Code SDK's intelligent context window management and auto-compaction
autoCompact.basicSettingsDescription: Enable and configure core parameters for auto-compaction
autoCompact.enableAutoCompactDescription: Automatically monitor context length and trigger compaction when needed
autoCompact.maxContextTokensHint: Claude 4 supports 200K tokens by default, recommended to set to 120K for performance
autoCompact.compactionIntervalHint: Minimum time interval between two compactions to prevent frequent compaction affecting performance
autoCompact.strategyDescription: Choose a compaction strategy suitable for your use case
autoCompact.smartCompressionDescription: Smart compression, preserving key information and decisions
autoCompact.aggressiveCompressionDescription: Aggressive compression, keeping only the most critical content
autoCompact.customInstructionsPlaceholder: Enter custom compression instructions to guide Claude on how to process context...
autoCompact.customInstructionsHint: These instructions will be combined with the base strategy for more precise compression control
autoCompact.preserveRecentMessagesDescription: Ensure the latest interactions are not compressed
autoCompact.activeSessionsDescription: Monitor the context status of all registered Claude sessions
autoCompact.noActiveSessionsHint: Sessions will appear here after starting a Claude Code session

translation.title: Smart Translation Settings
translation.basicSettingsDescription: Configure smart translation middleware for seamless Chinese-English translation
translation.apiKeyPlaceholder: Enter your Silicon Flow API key
translation.apiKeyDescription: Key for accessing Silicon Flow Translation API
translation.apiKeyHint: Get API key: Visit https://cloud.siliconflow.cn to register and get a free API key
translation.apiKeyWarning: Translation functionality will not work without configuring the API key
translation.apiKeyStep1: Visit Silicon Flow website to register an account
translation.apiKeyStep2: Create API key in the console
translation.apiKeyStep3: Enter the key in the input field above
translation.cacheManagementDescription: Manage translation result cache to improve response speed
translation.usageGuideDescription: Learn how the smart translation middleware works
translation.featureTransparent: Transparent Translation: User experience identical to direct Chinese conversation
translation.featureSmartDetection: Smart Detection: Automatically identify Chinese and English
translation.featureBidirectional: Bidirectional Translation: Chinese input → English sent, English response → Chinese displayed
translation.featureCacheOptimization: Cache Optimization: Same translations cached locally for faster response
translation.featureFallback: Fallback Protection: Automatically use original text when translation fails
translation.workflowStep2: Middleware detects Chinese and translates to English
translation.workflowStep5: Middleware translates English response to Chinese

promptContext.title: Context Extraction Configuration
promptContext.subtitle: Configure session context parameters for prompt optimization

presets.minimalDesc: Minimal context for simple tasks (2 rounds)
presets.balancedDesc: Default configuration for most scenarios (4 rounds)
presets.detailedDesc: Full context for complex tasks (8 rounds)

promptContext.maxMessagesDesc: Number of recent messages to extract. More context is better but consumes more tokens
promptContext.maxAssistantLengthDesc: Maximum characters per assistant response, exceeding will be truncated
promptContext.maxUserLengthDesc: Maximum characters per user prompt, exceeding will be truncated
promptContext.includeResultsDesc: Whether to include command execution results in context
promptContext.maxResultLengthDesc: Maximum characters per execution result, exceeding will be truncated
promptContext.contextNote: More context improves quality but increases API call costs

promptEnhancement.title: Prompt Enhancement API Configuration
promptEnhancement.subtitle: Configure third-party AI services for prompt optimization (OpenAI, Deepseek, Qwen, etc.)
promptEnhancement.noProvidersDescription: Add third-party AI services to use prompt enhancement feature
promptEnhancement.apiUrlHint: Supports simplified input, system will auto-complete /v1/chat/completions endpoint
promptEnhancement.apiFormatHint: System will auto-detect API format based on URL, or you can specify manually
promptEnhancement.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete provider {{name}}?

acemcp.title: Acemcp Project Context Search Configuration
acemcp.subtitle: Configure acemcp semantic search engine API endpoint and authentication
acemcp.apiEndpointDescription: Acemcp semantic search API endpoint address
acemcp.configureBaseUrl: Please configure BASE_URL and TOKEN first
acemcp.cliUsage: Use Acemcp in Claude Code CLI
acemcp.cliDescription: Export the built-in acemcp sidecar to use the same functionality in command line
acemcp.exportSuccess:
Acemcp sidecar exported to:
{{path}}

In the same directory as config.toml

Now you can configure it for use in Claude Code CLI.
acemcp.configCopied:
MCP configuration copied to clipboard!

Please paste into the mcpServers section of ~/.claude/settings.json
acemcp.projectContextHint: When 'Project Context' is enabled, prompt optimization will automatically call acemcp to search for relevant code

generalSettings.showSystemInitDescription: Display Session ID, Model, working directory and available tools at session start
generalSettings.hideWarmupDescription: Hide auto-sent Warmup messages and their replies in session messages (startup warmup messages)
generalSettings.includeCoauthoredDescription: Add Claude signature in git commits and pull requests
generalSettings.verboseOutputDescription: Show full bash and command output
generalSettings.promptSuggestionDescription: Auto-generate input suggestions based on conversation context, press Tab to accept
generalSettings.disableRewindGitOpsDescription: When enabled, rewind can only delete conversation history, cannot rollback code changes (suitable for collaboration or production)
generalSettings.chatRetentionDaysDescription: How long to keep local chat history (default: 30 days)
generalSettings.customClaudePathDescription: Manually specify a custom Claude CLI executable path
generalSettings.customPathSuccess: Custom Claude CLI path set successfully
generalSettings.pathValidationHint: Custom path will be validated before saving. Please ensure the file exists and is a valid Claude CLI executable.
generalSettings.customCodexPathDescription: Manually specify a custom Codex executable path (e.g., D:\nodejs\node_global\codex.ps1)
generalSettings.codexPathInvalid: Path invalid or Codex not executable
generalSettings.codexPathHint: On Windows, Codex may be located in npm/pnpm/yarn global installation directory.

permissionsSettings.title: Permission Rules
permissionsSettings.subtitle: Control which tools Claude Code can use without manual approval
permissionsSettings.noAllowRules: No allow rules configured. Claude will request approval for all tools.
permissionsSettings.exampleEditDir: Allow editing files in docs directory

environmentSettings.title: Environment Variables
environmentSettings.subtitle: Environment variables applied to every Claude Code session
environmentSettings.variableHint: Use the toggle to enable or disable environment variables. Only enabled variables will be applied to Claude Code sessions.

planMode.revertToPrompt: Revert to prompt #{{index}}, please select revert method
planMode.conversationOnlyDesc: Delete this message and all subsequent conversations, code remains unchanged
planMode.codeOnlyDesc: Roll back code to state before this message, keep conversation history
planMode.fullRevertDesc: Delete conversation and roll back code, restore to complete state before this message
planMode.revertWarning: Warning: This action cannot be undone, deleted conversations cannot be recovered.
planMode.cannotRollbackCode: This prompt cannot roll back code
